verses.verse: הודו <WH3034> O give thanks ליהוה <WH3068> unto the LORD; קראו <WH7121> call בשׁמו <WH8034> upon his name: הודיעו <WH3045> make known בעמים <WH5971> among the people. עלילותיו׃ <WH5949> his deeds
שׁירו <WH7891> Sing לו זמרו <WH2167> unto him, sing psalms לו שׂיחו <WH7878> unto him: talk בכל <WH3605> ye of all נפלאותיו׃ <WH6381> his wondrous works.
התהללו <WH1984> Glory בשׁם <WH8034> name: קדשׁו <WH6944> ye in his holy ישׂמח <WH8055> of them rejoice לב <WH3820> let the heart מבקשׁי <WH1245> that seek יהוה׃ <WH3068> the LORD.
דרשׁו <WH1875> Seek יהוה <WH3068> the LORD, ועזו <WH5797> and his strength: בקשׁו <WH1245> seek פניו <WH6440> his face תמיד׃ <WH8548> evermore.
זכרו <WH2142> Remember נפלאותיו <WH6381> his marvelous works אשׁר <WH834> that עשׂה <WH6213> he hath done; מפתיו <WH4159> his wonders, ומשׁפטי <WH4941> and the judgments פיו׃ <WH6310> of his mouth;
זרע <WH2233> O ye seed אברהם <WH85> of Abraham עבדו <WH5650> his servant, בני <WH1121> ye children יעקב <WH3290> of Jacob בחיריו׃ <WH972> his chosen.
הוא <WH1931> He יהוה <WH3068> the LORD אלהינו <WH430> our God: בכל <WH3605> in all הארץ <WH776> the earth. משׁפטיו׃ <WH4941> his judgments
זכר <WH2142> He hath remembered לעולם <WH5769> forever, בריתו <WH1285> his covenant דבר <WH1697> the word צוה <WH6680> he commanded לאלף <WH505> to a thousand דור׃ <WH1755> generations.
אשׁר <WH834> Which כרת <WH3772> he made את <WH854> with אברהם <WH85> Abraham, ושׁבועתו <WH7621> and his oath לישׂחק׃ <WH3446> unto Isaac;
ויעמידה <WH5975> And confirmed ליעקב <WH3290> the same unto Jacob לחק <WH2706> for a law, לישׂראל <WH3478> to Israel ברית <WH1285> covenant: עולם׃ <WH5769> an everlasting
לאמר <WH559> Saying, לך אתן <WH5414> Unto thee will I give את <WH853> ארץ <WH776> the land כנען <WH3667> of Canaan, חבל <WH2256> the lot נחלתכם׃ <WH5159> of your inheritance:
בהיותם <WH1961> When they were מתי <WH4962> a few men מספר <WH4557> in number; כמעט <WH4592> yea, very few, וגרים׃ <WH1481> and strangers
ויתהלכו <WH1980> When they went מגוי <WH1471> from one nation אל <WH413> to גוי <WH1471> another, מממלכה <WH4467> from kingdom אל <WH413> to עם <WH5971> people; אחר׃ <WH312> another
לא <WH3808> no הניח <WH3240> אדם <WH120> man לעשׁקם <WH6231> to do them wrong: ויוכח <WH3198> yea, he reproved עליהם <WH5921> for their sakes; מלכים׃ <WH4428> kings
אל <WH408> not תגעו <WH5060> Touch במשׁיחי <WH4899> mine anointed, ולנביאי <WH5030> and do my prophets אל <WH408> no תרעו׃ <WH7489> harm.
ויקרא <WH7121> Moreover he called for רעב <WH7458> a famine על <WH5921> upon הארץ <WH776> the land: כל <WH3605> the whole מטה <WH4294> staff לחם <WH3899> of bread. שׁבר׃ <WH7665> he broke
שׁלח <WH7971> He sent לפניהם <WH6440> before אישׁ <WH376> a man לעבד <WH5650> for a servant: נמכר <WH4376> was sold יוסף׃ <WH3130> them, Joseph,
ענו <WH6031> they hurt בכבל <WH3525> with fetters: רגליו <WH7272> Whose feet ברזל <WH1270> in iron: באה <WH935> was laid נפשׁו׃ <WH5315> he
עד <WH5704> Until עת <WH6256> the time בא <WH935> came: דברו <WH1697> that his word אמרת <WH565> the word יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD צרפתהו׃ <WH6884> tried
שׁלח <WH7971> sent מלך <WH4428> The king ויתירהו <WH5425> and loosed משׁל <WH4910> him; the ruler עמים <WH5971> of the people, ויפתחהו׃ <WH6605> and let him go free.
שׂמו <WH7760> He made אדון <WH113> him lord לביתו <WH1004> of his house, ומשׁל <WH4910> and ruler בכל <WH3605> of all קנינו׃ <WH7075> his substance:
לאסר <WH631> To bind שׂריו <WH8269> his princes בנפשׁו <WH5315> at his pleasure; וזקניו <WH2205> and teach his senators יחכם׃ <WH2449> wisdom.
ויבא <WH935> also came into ישׂראל <WH3478> Israel מצרים <WH4714> Egypt; ויעקב <WH3290> and Jacob גר <WH1481> sojourned בארץ <WH776> in the land חם׃ <WH2526> of Ham.
ויפר <WH6509> And he increased את <WH853> עמו <WH5971> his people מאד <WH3966> greatly; ויעצמהו <WH6105> and made them stronger מצריו׃ <WH6862> than their enemies.
הפך <WH2015> He turned לבם <WH3820> their heart לשׂנא <WH8130> to hate עמו <WH5971> his people, להתנכל <WH5230> to deal subtlely בעבדיו׃ <WH5650> with his servants.
שׁלח <WH7971> He sent משׁה <WH4872> Moses עבדו <WH5650> his servant; אהרן <WH175> Aaron אשׁר <WH834> whom בחר׃ <WH977> he had chosen.
שׂמו <WH7760> They showed בם דברי <WH1697> his signs אתותיו <WH226> his signs ומפתים <WH4159> among them, and wonders בארץ <WH776> in the land חם׃ <WH2526> of Ham.
שׁלח <WH7971> He sent חשׁך <WH2822> darkness, ויחשׁך <WH2821> and made it dark; ולא <WH3808> not מרו <WH4784> and they rebelled את <WH854> דברוו׃ <WH1697> against his word.
הפך <WH2015> He turned את <WH853> מימיהם <WH4325> their waters לדם <WH1818> into blood, וימת <WH4191> and slew את <WH853> דגתם׃ <WH1710> their fish.
שׁרץ <WH8317> brought forth frogs in abundance, ארצם <WH776> Their land צפרדעים <WH6854> brought forth frogs in abundance, בחדרי <WH2315> in the chambers מלכיהם׃ <WH4428> of their kings.
אמר <WH559> He spoke, ויבא <WH935> and there came ערב <WH6157> divers sorts of flies, כנים <WH3654> lice בכל <WH3605> in all גבולם׃ <WH1366> their coasts.
נתן <WH5414> He gave גשׁמיהם <WH1653> for rain, ברד <WH1259> them hail אשׁ <WH784> fire להבות <WH3852> flaming בארצם׃ <WH776> in their land.
ויך <WH5221> He smote גפנם <WH1612> their vines ותאנתם <WH8384> also and their fig trees; וישׁבר <WH7665> and broke עץ <WH6086> the trees גבולם׃ <WH1366> of their coasts.
אמר <WH559> He spoke, ויבא <WH935> came, ארבה <WH697> and the locusts וילק <WH3218> and caterpillars, ואין <WH369> and that without מספר׃ <WH4557> number,
ויאכל <WH398> And did eat up כל <WH3605> all עשׂב <WH6212> the herbs בארצם <WH776> in their land, ויאכל <WH398> and devoured פרי <WH6529> the fruit אדמתם׃ <WH127> of their ground.
ויך <WH5221> He smote כל <WH3605> also all בכור <WH1060> the firstborn בארצם <WH776> in their land, ראשׁית <WH7225> the chief לכל <WH3605> of all אונם׃ <WH202> their strength.
ויוציאם <WH3318> He brought them forth בכסף <WH3701> also with silver וזהב <WH2091> and gold: ואין <WH369> and not בשׁבטיו <WH7626> among their tribes. כושׁל׃ <WH3782> one feeble
שׂמח <WH8055> was glad מצרים <WH4714> Egypt בצאתם <WH3318> when they departed: כי <WH3588> for נפל <WH5307> of them fell פחדם <WH6343> the fear עליהם׃ <WH5921> upon
פרשׂ <WH6566> He spread ענן <WH6051> a cloud למסך <WH4539> for a covering; ואשׁ <WH784> and fire להאיר <WH215> to give light לילה׃ <WH3915> in the night.
שׁאל <WH7592> asked, ויבא <WH935> and he brought שׂלו <WH7958> quails, ולחם <WH3899> them with the bread שׁמים <WH8064> of heaven. ישׂביעם׃ <WH7646> and satisfied
פתח <WH6605> He opened צור <WH6697> the rock, ויזובו <WH2100> gushed out; מים <WH4325> and the waters הלכו <WH1980> they ran בציות <WH6723> in the dry places נהר׃ <WH5104> a river.
כי <WH3588> For זכר <WH2142> he remembered את <WH853> דבר <WH1697> promise, קדשׁו <WH6944> his holy את <WH853> אברהם <WH85> Abraham עבדו׃ <WH5650> his servant.
ויוצא <WH3318> And he brought forth עמו <WH5971> his people בשׂשׂון <WH8342> with joy, ברנה <WH7440> with gladness: את <WH853> בחיריו׃ <WH972> his chosen
ויתן <WH5414> And gave להם <WH1992> ארצות <WH776> them the lands גוים <WH1471> of the heathen: ועמל <WH5999> the labor לאמים <WH3816> of the people; יירשׁו׃ <WH3423> and they inherited
בעבור <WH5668> That ישׁמרו <WH8104> they might observe חקיו <WH2706> his statutes, ותורתיו <WH8451> his laws. ינצרו <WH5341> and keep הללו <WH1984> Praise יה׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD.
